title: Remove ASHA PF CONSULTANCY logo from hero and favicon

requirements.text: Remove the ASHA PF CONSULTANCY logo image from the Hero section so no logo graphic is rendered anywhere in the hero area.
acceptanceCriteria: The hero section no longer renders an for the logo (currently /assets/generated/asha-pf-logo-transparent.dim_1200x300.png).
The hero layout still looks intentional on mobile and desktop (no empty spacing where the logo used to be).

requirements.text: Remove the ASHA PF CONSULTANCY logo-based favicon so the site no longer uses the generated logo favicon asset.
acceptanceCriteria: frontend/index.html no longer references /assets/generated/asha-pf-favicon-transparent.dim_64x64.png as the favicon.
After the change, the browser tab icon is no longer the ASHA PF CONSULTANCY logo (it may fall back to the browser default if no replacement is provided).

constraints: Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui (read-only).
Do not modify frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, or frontend/src/main.tsx (immutable paths).
Do not change backend behavior or schema; this request is frontend-only.
nonGoals: Do not remove or rename the site title text "ASHA PF CONSULTANCY" in headings or page copy unless explicitly requested.
Do not delete the generated logo image files from the repository; only stop rendering/using them.
